data.message: Ive lost count of how many times I have wrote on your wall! Is there any way to contact you??? My family stood in the queue for 2 hours at minus degrees temperatures & the only smartphone we had was frozen & dead by the time we got to the front. The man took our photo & said we would have it within 2-3 days. This was weeks ago now! We triple checked the email address & everything was fine, wheres our picture??? 😪

replies.message: Hi Jules, could you please send us your email address via a Private Message, so we can look into this for you. Thanks
